Text: no subject Cc Dear friends As discussed in the last executive committee meeting I am preparing a list of individuals for Fred Schroeder to interview when they are here to work with us in November Id like to send them to possiblilities as they can see a good number over the time theyre here and those they dont catch now can be contacted for a later trip Fred suggested we look at this as a first wave of some people who know us well more interviews with those at a greater distance will come later Please let me know your thoughts Carol Ballard Fayez Sarofim Louisa Sarofim Sissy andor Denny Kempner Roy Nolan Bob Palmquist Susan Garwood Eddie Allen Louise Jamail Peter Marzio Emily Todd Steve Susman Isabel andor Wally Wilson Michael Zilkha Ann Hamman Marti Mayo Director Contemporary Arts Museum Montrose Houston TX

First Executive Comm Mtg Of the Year Cc Dear friends We have hastily scheduled our first executive committee meeting of the new fiscal year for THURSDAY SEPTEMBER AT AT THE MUSEUM Please forgive this short notice which is necessary as it became clear that Mrs Ballard Chair would be out of town for much of the month of September and we need to have an executive committee meeting in advance of the September meeting of the Board of Trustees At the Thursday meeting well create a schedule for executive committee meetings for the year as well as establish a time and place for the meetings which is mutually convenient Last year the committee met once a month on Wednesdays at the Bayou Club which proved to work well for everyone Please let Cheryl know if you will be able to attend Thursdays meeting You may reach her at or by email to Thanks and I hope to see you Thursday Marti Mayo Director Contemporary Arts Museum Montrose Houston TX

Re no subjectOn PM wrote Forgive the question who is Fred Schroeder Jeff Original Message From Marti Mayo ENRON Sent Monday October PM To Eddie Allen Sissy Kempner Ginni Mithoff Roy Nolan Bob Palmquist Stephen D Susman Laura Walls Michael Zilkha Jeff Shankman Cc Mike Reed Karen Soh Subject no subject Dear friends As discussed in the last executive committee meeting I am preparing a list of individuals for Fred Schroeder to interview when they are here to work with us in November Id like to send them to possiblilities as they can see a good number over the time theyre here and those they dont catch now can be contacted for a later trip Fred suggested we look at this as a first wave of some people who know us well more interviews with those at a greater distance will come later Please let me know your thoughts Carol Ballard Fayez Sarofim Louisa Sarofim Sissy andor Denny Kempner Roy Nolan Bob Palmquist Susan Garwood Eddie Allen Louise Jamail Peter Marzio Emily Todd Steve Susman Isabel andor Wally Wilson Michael Zilkha Ann Hamman Marti Mayo Director Contemporary Arts Museum Montrose Houston TX This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Jeff Fred is half the firm of ResnicowSchroeder who we have hired approved by the board in Sept to work with us in developing our new strategic plan They are also going to develop our institutional identity brand and will rep us pr Wise in NYC and abroad where we are mostly ignored Sorry should have caught you up before Marti Mayo Director Contemporary Arts Museum Montrose Houston TX
